caption.p: Antioxidant, anticholinesterase, and antidiabetic potential of the essential oil from the fruits of Elaeagnus umbellata Thunb. and their linear correlation with standard ascorbic acid, galantamine, and acarbose [( a) Percent DPPH and ( b) ABTS free radical scavenging activity, ( c) Percent acetyl cholinesterase (AChE), and ( d) buterly cholinesterase (BChE) inhibition, ( e) Percent α-glucosidase inhibition, and ( f) Percent α-amylase inhibition potential of essential oil of Elaeagnus umbellata]
